greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n = -oo..oo} exp(-n^2).
comment: A Riemann sum approximation to Integral_{-oo..oo} exp(-x^2) dx = sqrt(Pi).
reference: Mentioned by N. D. Elkies in a lecture on the Poisson summation formula in Nashville TN in May 2010.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 25 2011
